channel.title: 2. Preparation on RDS Performance Insights & Query Optimization
channel.description: Recent content in 2. Preparation on RDS Performance Insights & Query Optimization

item.title: Prerequisites & Requirements
item.description: Prerequisites & Requirements üîß Technical Prerequisites AWS Account Requirements AWS Account: Active AWS account with appropriate permissions RDS Access: Ability to modify RDS instances and parameter groups IAM Permissions: Required permissions for Performance Insights and CloudWatch Billing Access: Understanding of potential costs for extended retention Supported Database Engines Performance Insights is available for: Engine Minimum Version Notes Amazon Aurora MySQL 5.6.10a Full feature support Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL 9.6.3 Full feature support RDS for MySQL 5.

item.title: Environment Setup
item.description: Environment Setup üèóÔ∏è Development Environment Local Development Setup Required Tools Installation # Install AWS CLI curl "https://awscli.amazonaws.com/awscli-exe-linux-x86_64.zip" -o "awscliv2.zip" unzip awscliv2.zip sudo ./aws/install # Verify installation aws --version # Configure AWS credentials aws configure Database Client Tools # PostgreSQL client sudo apt-get install postgresql-client # MySQL client sudo apt-get install mysql-client # Universal database client (optional) sudo snap install dbeaver-ce Monitoring Tools # Install Python for custom scripts sudo apt-get install python3 python3-pip # Install required Python packages pip3 install boto3 pandas matplotlib psycopg2-binary pymysql üîß AWS Environment Configuration IAM Setup Create Performance Insights Role # Create IAM policy for Performance Insights aws iam create-policy \ --policy-name PerformanceInsightsPolicy \ --policy-document file://performance-insights-policy.
